name: Holiday Magic
description:
This project was made for the Jame Gam. It is still under construction, but I just ran out of time. I thought I would go ahead and let you all see what I have so far.

Controls:

Use the mouse to aim and the left mouse button to throw presents.

Try to get the presents in the chimneys. Try not to miss a house or Christmas will be ruined. The present must get in the chimney to count. Only 1 present per house is allowed!

Thanks for playing!
